00060 enum GCPlacement {
00061     UseGC, 
00062     NoGC, 
00063     PointerFreeGC 
00066 };
00067 
00075 class Object {
00076 #ifndef SYLPH_DOXYGEN
00077 public:
00078 Object();
00079 virtual ~Object();
00080 inline void* operator new( size_t size);
00081 inline void* operator new( size_t size, GCPlacement gcp);
00082 inline void* operator new( size_t size, void *p);
00083 /* Must be redefined here, since the other overloadings */
00084 /* hide the global definition.                          */
00085 inline void operator delete( void* obj);
00086 inline void operator delete( void*, GCPlacement);
00087 /* called if construction fails.        */
00088 inline void operator delete( void*, void*);
00089 
00090 inline void* operator new[](size_t size);
00091 inline void* operator new[](size_t size, GCPlacement gcp);
00092 inline void* operator new[](size_t size, void *p);
00093 inline void operator delete[](void* obj);
00094 inline void operator delete[](void*, GCPlacement);
00095 inline void operator delete[](void*, void*);
00096 private:
00097 #endif
00098 };
